short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear cookies for the current site with a beautiful interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cookie Clearer is a powerful yet user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enhance your online privacy. With a sleek interface, it displays the number of cookies present on the current website you're visiting. The extension allows you to effortlessly clear all cookies for the active site with just one click, providing immediate feedback on the action taken. It features a clean, intuitive design with the site's favicon and domain name clearly visible. Cookie Clearer also integrates seamlessly into Chrome's context menu, offering quick access to its functionality. Whether you're privacy-conscious or simply looking to manage your digital footprint, Cookie Clearer provides an efficient solution for controlling cookies on a site-by-site basis.
